title: Short-Intensive Course on Early Childhood Dance Education Using E-Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic dance theory and educational methodologies
context.additional_context: Mobile learning using personal devices, providing microlearning content combining theory and practice videos; learning effectiveness verified through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Design and operate E-module-based dance education programs appropriate for early childhood developmental stages
Apply core dance education techniques (e.g., body expression, rhythm training) for young children using interactive content delivered in mobile environments
Analyze real-world cases of early childhood dance education and propose creative instructional strategies through project-based assessments

resources: Early Childhood Dance Education Theory Video

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
